message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn to be reasonable, Alice.  How about a 55/45 split?
Meet me in the middle of our two offers, 58-42 is fair.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm coming down, you're coming up - deal?
I'm still willing to compromise, but I won't go below 57-43.
This is getting silly, Alice.  Take a breath and let's close this out.  51/49?
I'm willing to meet you closer, but 51-49 is still too low. 56-44 is my new bottom line.
